english.segment1: I need to just admit. My faith is paper thin. I'm feeling so burned out on religion
english.segment2: I say an empty prayer. I sing a tired song. I need to just admit. that the passions gone. And I want to get it back
english.segment3: You told me. Look for you, and I will find. So I'm here. Like I'm searching for the first time. Revive me, Jesus. Make this cold heart start to move. Help me rediscover You
english.segment4: I want to learn to pray. The way that David prayed. I want my soul to burn. when I hear Your name
english.segment5: I want to feel like new. I want to hunger for You. Bring me back to life like only You can do. Cause I don't want to stay the same
english.segment6: Lord, I want to be Yours today. I want to know the passion of the saints. And how they were changed
english.segment7: I want to burn for You. Bring me back to life. Jesus, help me rediscover You
